Actions.Name: Lure
Actions.Description: At the start of the round, the [name] puts a lure out adjacent to a foe of its choice. The lure is a size 1 intangible summon.

Actions.Name: Lure Spines
Actions.Effects: This attack can only be made from the Lure's location instead of the [name]'s main body.

Actions.Name: The Maw
Effects: Foe must save or be stunned.
Deals bonus damage to weakened foes.

Actions.Name: Reel In
Actions.Description: The [name] moves its lure up to 4 spaces towards it, then shoves all adjacent characters to the lure the same amount in the same direction. Characters can pass a save to reduce this shove to 1

Actions.Name: Acid Spit
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes take 3 damage and must save or be weakened.

Actions.Name: Submerge
Actions.Description: The [name] submerges into the ground, removing itself from the battlefield, then resurfaces in free space in range 4, even to an occupied area. When it resurfaces, characters in its area take [fray] damage, are removed then placed in the closest adjacent space of its choice, then shoved 1.
